amendment.description: An amendment numbered 69 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to strike "social" from the scope of factors examined under the FAA Beyond Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike "social" from the scope of factors examined under the Federal Aviation Administration Beyond Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 244 (Roll no. 355).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Ogles.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 244 (Roll no. 355).
